title: All champions and minions stop moving
body:
Every so often all champions and minions stop moving (along with me). My ms and fps remain normal (ms is usually 60-100ish, fps is usually 60-120ish) The screen doesn't freeze all together, champions continue to bob up and down, but they just remain in place. Often my health will rapidly diminish as I'm frozen in place. It might be my computer specs which are:  

Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i7 CPU
Model: HP Elite 7000 Microtower
System type: 64-bit OS

replies.body: Yup, as *Michaeloo* mentioned, this is very likely to be caused by *Packet Loss*. This often happens if there are either incompatible network settings on your local network or if there's an issue between your PC and our servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step and if you run into any further issues, let me know.

•Network packet buffering may be excessive 

Is this what I'm looking for?
That could cause issues, but was everything else fine in your tests?
Ah. Those results aren't too worrisome. Do you still experience issues in matches after working through all the steps in the connection guide?

•Network packet buffering may be excessive 
•We received unexpected and possibly dangerous results when looking up important names 
•The path between our system and your network does not appear to handle fragmented IPv6 traffic properly 
•Your computer's clock is slightly slow
Ah, I'll look into that, thanks!

It seems to me you are experiencing packet loss. I would do a ping test to the League of Legends game servers and see if you loss packets when pinging it. If are in fact losing packets I have no solution.
